Reviews.Title: “Hotel does not deserve such bad reviews anymore”
Reviews.Author: vincentvitlock
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 days late janfeb mean bad reviews clean tidy staff helpful hotel price paying cant pool shame indian restaurants door

Reviews.Title: “Queens Hotel, Not what you would expect in Dubai”
Reviews.Author: mstonebanks
Reviews.Content: recently travelled dubai join cruise onboard brilliance seas terrific joining ship overnight stay dubai unfortunately stayed queens hotel leaving airport taxi magnificent streets buildings slowly decended onto call shanty dubai arrival hotel late night steps negotiate luggage nice hotel reception rating travel agents 3 star notice outside 2 star reception expectaions 30 mins book ones lift lift balcony catered 2 people standing looking describe building converted washing line street hotel conjested rubish bathroom dirty dare wash deciding wait ship bath plughole choked hair grease breakfast served beside pool disgusting boiled eggs bread tomatoes curry fungus supposed mushrooms self serve tea coffee tables dirty cutlery pool total disrepair broken window blinds covered paper broken chairs etc etc wait quick departed approached reception taxi ship totally refused told own outside recommend hotel thankfully stay 1 night

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting!!”
Reviews.Author: Anndyyy
Reviews.Content: wouldnt recommend hotel worst crowded dubai town ladies buy dress local arabic women wear planning stay hotel dont call dress minute walk outta hotel feel eyes kinds people staring huge telescopes lol stinks hell uh planned stay bit honestly looking hotel day luckily found luck youve paid planning crash soon thanks
